name: Head Charge
summary: Deals damage, and the user receives a recoil damage of 1/4 done to the target.
viability: As Bouffalant's signature move, Head Charge does its job beautifully in conjunction with Reckless. It reaches a total power of 216 after Reckless and STAB, which is insane. When running Bouffalant, it is a must to use this move.
